snippet: Utah center Rudy Gobert wasn't so sure that his buzzer-beating tip-in off George Hill's miss at the end of overtime would be upheld, even as he watched replays of it on the giant scoreboard at Golden 1 Center....

headline.main: U.S. Detects North Korean Missile Launch, No Threat to North America
headline.print_headline: U.S. Detects North Korean Missile Launch, No Threat to North America

lead_paragraph: Utah center Rudy Gobert wasn't so sure that his buzzer-beating tip-in off George Hill's miss at the end of overtime would be upheld, even as he watched replays of it on the giant scoreboard at Golden 1 Center.
